HERO.TITLE: Welcome to SDK
HERO.SUBTITLE: The most renowned German language academy in Egypt

EXPERIENCED_TUTORS.TITLE: Experienced Tutors
EXPERIENCED_TUTORS.DESCRIPTION: Our academy is staffed with highly experienced and qualified tutors who are dedicated to helping you achieve your language goals.

INTERACTIVE_CLASSES.TITLE: Interactive Online Classes
INTERACTIVE_CLASSES.DESCRIPTION: We offer interactive online classes that make learning engaging and effective, allowing you to study from the comfort of your home.

FLEXIBLE_SCHEDULING.TITLE: Flexible Scheduling
FLEXIBLE_SCHEDULING.DESCRIPTION: Our flexible scheduling options allow you to fit language learning into your busy life, making it convenient for everyone.

COMPREHENSIVE_MATERIALS.TITLE: Comprehensive Learning Materials
COMPREHENSIVE_MATERIALS.DESCRIPTION: We provide comprehensive learning materials that cover all aspects of the German language, from basic to advanced levels.

INTERNATIONAL_CERTIFICATION.TITLE: Internationally Recognized Certification
INTERNATIONAL_CERTIFICATION.DESCRIPTION: Our certification is recognized internationally, giving you the credentials you need to pursue further education or career opportunities.

ONLINE_COURSES.TITLE: Online Courses
ONLINE_COURSES.DESCRIPTION: Interactive online courses designed for all levels of learners. Study at your own pace from anywhere in the world.

OFFLINE_COURSES.TITLE: Offline Courses
OFFLINE_COURSES.DESCRIPTION: In-person courses with experienced tutors in a classroom setting. Perfect for hands-on learning and immediate feedback.

CONVERSATION_COURSES.TITLE: Conversation Courses
CONVERSATION_COURSES.DESCRIPTION: Improve your speaking skills with our conversation courses. Practice real-life scenarios and enhance your fluency.

BUYING_BOOKS.TITLE: Buying Books
BUYING_BOOKS.DESCRIPTION: Access a wide range of learning materials and books to supplement your studies. Available for all proficiency levels.
